summary: This is a government opposition filing in the case of United States v. Maxwell, specifically opposing the defendant's Rule 412 motion. It was submitted by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case United States v. Maxwell, who filed a Rule 412 motion that the government is opposing.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Submitted the government's opposition to the defendant's Rule 412 motion on behalf of the Southern District of New York.

connections.description: The Assistant United States Attorney is prosecuting the case against the defendant Maxwell, as evidenced by filing the opposition to her motion.

events.title: Government files opposition to Rule 412 motion
events.description: The government filed its opposition to the defendant Maxwell's Rule 412 motion in the case United States v. Maxwell.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a government opposition filing in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell.
The government is opposing a Rule 412 motion filed by the defendant Maxwell.
The filing was submitted by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York on November 2, 2021.
